review: I am so extremely disappointed in this item's performance.  Perhaps my expectations were too high??  I own two Samsung streaming BluRay players and consistently have difficulty streaming.  I have tried everything to resolve and still they either won't recognize the wireless signal or they buffer buffer buffer and quit.  I did expect this Fire Stick to work great with both Amazon movies and Netflix but I continue to have buffering issues.  Although when AmazonPrime checks signal speed, I get 2.5+, movies still don't play consistently, don't load at all or buffer every few minutes.  I kept trying and trying to resolve with various equipment changes/rebooting etc but after 3 mos I have given up altogether and now Amazon wont take back their Fire Stick.  Interestingly, the Netflix rep. told me never to use Fire Stick with Netflix, only a Roku but I am not willing to throw any more cash at this issue.
